answers.answer: Get a second opinion.  My niece has jeuvenile diabetes and those were her exact symptoms.  He should have a blood test.

How old is your son?  You should look into Diabetes Insipidus.  My daughter is having similar issues and thats what we are currently testing for.  I also havent ruled out regular diabetes either, even though they've not found her sugar to be high.  Does your son's breath sometimes smell like nail polish remover?

question: My so drink's loads and wee's alll the time. He sleep's from 5:30 pm till 7:30 am , the dr has tested his wee already it came back fine , but i'm still worried.
title: he drinks and wees a lot
